results.title: The Blowfly menace
results.creator_credit: A. C. McKay BVSc and Australian Wool Corporation
results.brief_description: For farmers and graziers this study of the life-cycle of the green blowfly and other flies associated with blowfly strike in sheep, and demonstrations of various methods of control, should prove both useful and interesting.

results.title: Just a story
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Ministry of Education, Barbara Boyd-Anderson, Tony Paice and Diane O'Connor
results.brief_description: An attempt to show that storytelling is not just part of literature but is part of the everyday world around us and the ways in which we relate to each other. Demonstrates that our own experiences provide a rich source of information which may be drawn upon for the writing of stories.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Ministry of Education, Barbara Boyd-Anderson, Tony Paice and Diane O’Connor

results.title: Crescent moon = Yueyaer  = 月牙儿
results.creator_credit: Zhanag Fan, Wang Zhi An, Huo Zhuang, Li Dong De, Xing Dan, Xu Xiaoxing and Beijing Film Studio
results.brief_description:
Based on a short story written in the 1930s by Lao She, ‘Crescent Moon’ portrays the inexorable injustice exerted by an unfair economic system, through the reminiscences of a young girl gradually forced into prostitution by poverty. Yuerong’s father dies when she is only a little girl; her mother remarries a kind patron, but he dies too. Penury pushes her mother into prostitution, for which Yuerong cannot forgive her. She leaves home and lives at school, but after graduation is unable to find work. She lets a man take care of her for a while, but then discovers he is married. Later she becomes a waitress, but loses the job when she refuses to sleep with the customers. In the end she has no choice but to follow in her mother’s footsteps.

Credits: Directors, Huo Zhuang, Xu Xiaoxing, Xing Dan ; writers, Huo Zhuang, Zhang Fan, Wang Zhi’an ; photography, Sun Cheng, Meng Fanjun ; music, Liv Zhuang ; editing, Zhon Tingmei, An Xiaohua.
Cast: Song Dandan, Siqin Gaowa.

results.title: Ampex H.S 100 video disc recorder
results.brief_description: Ampex H.S 100 video disc recorder. One of the first units used on Australian television to facilitate ‘slow mo’ replays of football action. Disc capacity approx 9 seconds. Includes one x spare 15” disc. Circa 1960s/70s
